title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: TVLine Items: For All Mankind Casts Adult [Spoiler], The Boys Enlists Stranger Things Vet and More
description: For All Mankind’s latest time jump will come with a couple growth spurts. The Apple TV+ alt-history drama has enlisted The Summer I Turned Pretty’s Sean Kaufman to play an older version of Kelly Baldwin and Alexei Poletov’s son, Alex, our sister site Deadline reports. The character, who is named after his late father, was seen […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: One Direction’s Liam Payne Dead at 31
description: Liam Payne, who rose to fame as a member of chart-topping British boy band One Direction, has died after falling from a hotel balcony in Buenos Aires. He was just 31 years old. Payne died Wednesday evening, CNN reports, with several witnesses saying he fell from a third-floor balcony at the CasaSur Palermo Hotel in […]
author: Dave Nemetz
